services.title: Machine Sales
services.desc: New & pre-owned Mazak CNC machines. Expert consultation to match the right machine to your application.
services.tagline: The right machine for every application
services.description: As an authorized Mazak distributor, we offer the full range of Mazak CNC machine tools — from compact turning centers to large-capacity multi-tasking machines. Our sales team works closely with your engineering staff to evaluate your applications, recommend the ideal machine configuration, and ensure a smooth purchase process.
features: Full Mazak product line — turning, milling, multi-tasking, 5-axis, and automation
New and certified pre-owned machines available
Application-based machine selection with engineering consultation
Demo cuts and test parts at our technology center
Trade-in evaluations on your existing equipment
Delivery coordination and installation support

process.detail: We review your parts, materials, tolerances, and production volumes to understand your needs.
Our team presents machine options with specifications, pricing, and ROI analysis.
See your parts run on the recommended machine at our technology center.
Coordinated delivery, rigging, installation, and power-up at your facility.

services.title: Turnkey Solutions
services.desc: Complete packages: tooling, fixturing, programming, and training. Walk in, press cycle start.
services.description: A turnkey solution means your machine arrives ready to produce parts from day one. We handle everything — tooling selection, fixture design, CNC programming, process prove-out, and operator training. Your team walks up to the machine, loads a part, and presses cycle start.
features: Complete tooling packages selected for your specific applications
Custom fixture design and manufacturing
CNC program development and optimization
Process prove-out with test cuts and cycle time verification
Operator and programmer training at your facility
Documentation package with setup sheets and tool lists

process.detail: We study your drawings, materials, tolerances, and production requirements.
Our engineers design the complete package — tooling, fixtures, programs, and process.
We run your parts, verify quality, and optimize cycle times before delivery.
On-site training for your operators and programmers with full documentation.

services.title: Automation
services.desc: Robotic cells, pallet systems, bar feeders, and custom automation to maximize spindle uptime.
services.tagline: Maximize spindle uptime, minimize labor dependency
services.description: Automation is the key to competitiveness in modern manufacturing. We design and integrate robotic loading cells, pallet pool systems, bar feeders, gantry loaders, and custom automation solutions that keep your machines running — even when your operators go home.
features: Robotic machine tending cells with vision systems
Multi-pallet pool systems for horizontal and 5-axis machines
Bar feeder integration for turning centers
Gantry loaders for high-volume production
Conveyor and part handling systems
Lights-out manufacturing consultation and implementation

process.detail: We evaluate your current workflow, part mix, and production goals.
Our automation team designs the cell layout, robot programming, and integration plan.
We install, program, and debug the complete automation system at your facility.
Ongoing support to fine-tune cycle times, uptime, and throughput.

services.title: Service & Parts
services.desc: Factory-trained technicians. 24/7 emergency support. Preventive maintenance programs.
services.tagline: Keep your machines running at peak performance
services.description: Downtime costs money. Our factory-trained service technicians are available 24/7 for emergency repairs, and our preventive maintenance programs help you avoid unplanned downtime altogether. We stock genuine Mazak parts and can diagnose issues remotely to get you back in production fast.
features: Factory-trained and Mazak-certified service technicians
24/7 emergency service hotline
Preventive maintenance programs and service contracts
Genuine Mazak OEM replacement parts in stock
Remote diagnostics and troubleshooting support
Spindle repair and rebuild services

process.detail: Call our service hotline or submit a request online — 24/7 availability.
Remote troubleshooting or on-site visit to identify the issue quickly.
Our technicians perform the repair using genuine OEM parts.
We verify machine performance and recommend preventive measures.

services.title: Engineering
services.desc: Application engineering, process optimization, and custom solutions for complex manufacturing challenges.
services.description: Our application engineers have deep expertise in metalcutting, tooling, fixturing, and CNC programming. Whether you're trying to reduce cycle times, improve surface finish, tackle a difficult material, or figure out how to machine a complex geometry — we can help.
features: Application engineering for new and existing parts
Cycle time reduction and process optimization
Difficult material expertise (titanium, Inconel, hardened steel)
Complex geometry and 5-axis programming support
Tooling and workholding recommendations
Time studies and cost-per-part analysis

process.detail: Share your part drawings, current process, and goals with our team.
We develop an optimized approach — toolpaths, tooling, speeds and feeds.
Test cuts and process verification to confirm results.
We deploy the solution on your shop floor with operator support.

services.title: Financing
services.desc: Flexible financing options, leasing programs, and trade-in evaluations to fit your capital budget.
services.tagline: Flexible options to fit your capital plan
services.description: Investing in new CNC equipment is a major decision. We offer a range of financing and leasing options to help you acquire the technology you need without straining your capital budget. From traditional financing to operating leases and trade-in programs, we'll find the right structure for your business.
features: Traditional equipment financing with competitive rates
Operating and capital lease programs
Deferred payment and seasonal payment structures
Trade-in evaluations on your existing equipment
Section 179 tax deduction guidance
Custom payment plans for multi-machine purchases

process.detail: We discuss your budget, cash flow needs, and acquisition timeline.
Our team presents financing structures tailored to your situation.
Simple application process with fast credit decisions.
Finalize terms and coordinate machine delivery.
